refnamediv.refpurpose: returns an arbitrary value from the multiset passed to it.

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: DB.DBA.SAMPLE is aggregate function that returns an arbitrary value from the multiset passed to it.
Note: Using the "sql:" prefix is mandatory for this aggregate.

para.link: Differences between DB.DBA.SAMPLE, DB.DBA.GROUP_CONCAT and DB.DBA.GROUP_DIGEST functions usage.
